EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Normal 0 false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE
{!Account.Name}:{!Account.AccountNumber}
Dear {!Account.Name} Team,
Welcome to VinSolutions! It was a pleasure speaking with you and I look forward to our next scheduled call. As your VinPro, I will be your personal advocate within the company. I will be providing assistance with escalated issues to help you reach your fullest potential by helping you navigate through the system. As a VinPro, my days are typically filled with scheduled calls and meetings. In an effort to ensure you receive a timely response, please consider emailing me if I'm unavailable via phone.
Support-related issues can be submitted via Email, Customer Portal or by Phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com
Phone: 1-800-980-7488 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-4pm CST)
Customer Portal: The Portal is where you can create a ticket and find solutions to frequently asked questions.
In order to better assist you, please make sure you create a ticket with the support department and send me an email with the ticket number. By providing me this information, I can follow the ticket and make sure it gets resolved in a timely fashion.
I look forward to speaking with you soon. Please remember if you can't reach me by phone, you can email me. Also, if you have a support-related issue, you will need to create a ticket and email me the ticket number so that I can follow up on the progress. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Once again, Welcome to VinSolutions!
Donna Stearns I have been in the car business now for about 7 years. I started out working at Adams Chevrolet-a little country town dealership-and sold about 12-18 cars a month. I enjoyed it and loved the customers but hated the hours. One day a manager that I had worked with at Adams called me up and said he wanted me to come interview for this job. I have now been a member of the VinSolutions family for four years. During my employment with Vin, I have worked in Support, the Virtual Training dept., in sales as a DDM, then I went back to support as an Account Manager, and then a Dealer Advocate-which they are now referring to as a VinPro. I handle all the Northeast customers and I am looking forward to working with you!
Sincerely,
Donna Stearns VinPro Northeast Region VinSolutions.com donna.stearns@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 45813 C: 913-927-8094
We are always striving to improve our product and customer service. To reach this goal of excellence, we would love to hear from you! Please submit feedback of your experience, positive or negative, at VinCares@vinsolutions.com.
